> **[DEPRECATED]** Since 3.0.0. Will be removed with 4.0.0
Not maintained anymore.

## Properties

| Property                     | Attribute                      | Description                                       | Type                                     | Default     |
| ---------------------------- | ------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `message`                    | `message`                      | Message of the tooltip                            | `string \| undefined`                    | `undefined` |
| `placement`                  | `placement`                    | Placement of the tooltip                          | `"bottom" \| "left" \| "right" \| "top"` | `'top'`     |
| `suppressAutomaticPlacement` | `suppress-automatic-placement` | Suppress the automatic placement of the dropdown. | `boolean`                                | `false`     |


## Slots

| Slot                | Description                              |
| ------------------- | ---------------------------------------- |
| `"tooltip-message"` | Custom tooltip message with html support |
